## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have used descriptive function/variable names

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have verified no regressions in existing features

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation site if needed
- [ ] I have added examples for new features
- [ ] All documentation builds successfully

### Commits
- [ ] My commits are atomic and well-described
- [ ] I have followed the commit message conventions
- [ ] I have rebased on the latest dev branch
- [ ] My branch is up-to-date with the base branch

- [ ] This PR introduces no breaking changes
- [ ] OR: I have documented all breaking changes below
